extension.name: STLTranslator
extension.author: Nik Trevallyn-Jones

plugin.export:
Import an STL file
@param the File object to import

extension.comments: This is a derivative work, based heavily on existing code within AOI and a script by Francois Guilett.

history.log: - Changes for AOI 2.5 compatibility - Support for new 'direct-import' code
Long-overdue classification as stable. Removed the beta flag.
Fixed a bug which caused normals to be exported without translation to global coords
set the default display mode to "shaded" for imported meshes.
improvement to the importStream and exportStream interface, and two example scripts to drive it.
changed the interface to importStream() and exportStream() to (re)enable access by external code and scripts.
- Stable release (beta 1) - added control over significant digits for export - uses SolidTool plugin to validate and edit/fix objects for export
- fixed parsing error of crlf pairs (eg DOS) - fixed a problem that could occur if an import was abandoned
consolidated error handling into main GUI
improved error handling for exported objects
- auto detection of binary/ascii files - frame option frames each view - added error tolerance for import - minor interface improvements
- changed error reporting of "holes" to calculating hole count - added the ability to export multiple object as a single STL solid
- improved import to read numbers in scientific notation - removed calls to java 1.5 methods (String.replace())
- added binary import/export - added validation of import/export
